document.full_text: twice runner-up robin soderling set up a return match with champion rafa nadal after battering home hope gilles simon 6-2 6-3 7-6 in the french open last 16 on monday.
document.title: soderling silences crowd at french open with win over simon
lines_and_colors: twice runner-up robin soderling set up a return match with champion rafa nadal after battering home hope gilles simon 6-2 6-3 7-6 in the french open last 16 on monday.
